title: Deep Desires
description: Charlene can only be truly satisfied by big men, so in order to be supplied with a steady stream of experienced lovers who possess the right proportions, she joins a dating agency called Deep Desires. They specialize in hooking up the right men with the women who need them most. Her first date is hunky Brad, and he not only has all the right pieces, he has the moves as well. What follows is a hot night with the best sex Charlene has ever had! Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
